quote: There is hope in forgiveness
author: John Piper,  A Sweet and Bitter Providence: Sex, Race, and the Sovereignty of God

quote: Forgiveness means letting go of the hope for a better past.
author: Lama Surya Das

quote: Forgiveness takes away the burdens of past.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Forgiveness is God's greatest gift
author: Dan Brown,  The Da Vinci Code

quote: Forgiveness is a process of accepting the past and welcoming the mysterious beauty of the future.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Forgiveness reveals the ultimate beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness
author: Robert Muller

quote: Forgiveness is the best tonic for heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: For there are two kinds of forgiveness in the world: the one you practice because everything really is all right, and what went before is mended. The other kind of forgiveness you practice because someone needs desperately to be forgiven, or because you need just as badly to forgive them, for a heart can grab hold of old wounds and go sour as milk over them.
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  The Girl Who Fell Beneath Fairyland and Led the Revels There

quote: Healing Follows Forgiveness
author: Pat Bluth

quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Forgiveness is the name of love practiced among people who love poorly. The hard truth is that all people love poorly. We need to forgive and be forgiven every day, every hour increasingly. That is the great work of love among the fellowship of the weak that is the human family.
author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quote: Forgiveness without understanding is like faith without proof.
author: Jessica Francis Kane,  The Report

quote: Forgiveness is the most compassionate way toward the peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To forgive is to be free from past resentment to welcome the dawn of peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Learning to forgive is the greatest way to find inner peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Forgiveness is not something you do for someone else; it's something you do for yourself. To forgive is not to condone, it is to refuse to continue feeling bad about an injury.
author: Jim Beaver,  Life's That Way: A Memoir

quote: Forgiveness has to be repeated, the bible says seventy times seven.
author: Max Patrick

quote: Knowing that you are completely forgiven destroys the power of sin in your life.
author: Joseph Prince

quote: Always forgive, but never forget, else you will be a prisoner of your own hatred, and doomed to repeat your mistakes forever.
author: Wil Zeus,  Sun Beyond the Clouds

quote: Forgiveness is that subtle thread that binds both love and friendship. Without forgiveness, you may not even have a child one day.
author: George Foreman

quote: Love without reason; forgive without judging.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Forgiveness is created by the restitution of the abuser; of the wrongdoer. It is not something to be squeeeeeezed out of the victim in a further act of conscience-corrupting abuse.
author: Stefan Molyneux

quote: My experience with forgiveness is that it sort of comes spontaneously at a certain point and to try to force it it's not really forgiveness. It's Buddhist philosophy or something spiritual jargon that you're trying to live up to but you're just using it against yourself as a reason why you're not okay.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
author: Joan Lunden

quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
author: Mahatma Gandhi,  All Men are Brothers: Autobiographical Reflections

quote: To stop war, teach peace, love, cooperation, and most of all—forgiveness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Forgive everyone. Forgive every misery and misfortune with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be wise enough to forgive; be kind enough to love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Forgive yourself before you die. Then forgive others.
author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: The best punishment for an enemy is forgiveness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love hard--forgive harder.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I have learned, that the person I have to ask for forgiveness from the most is: myself. You must love yourself. You have to forgive yourself, everyday, whenever you remember a shortcoming, a flaw, you have to tell yourself "That's just fine". You have to forgive yourself so much, until you don't even see those things anymore. Because that's what love is like.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: People, in general, would rather die than forgive. It's that hard.
author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: Marriage [10w] The only thing better than forgiveness in marriage is forgetfulness.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: People say, 'It's hard to forgive...et al'. I think it's much harder to live peacefully. So, forgive and focus on living peacefully.
author: m.ralte

quote: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: Forgiveness isn’t something I’m preoccupied with — turning the other cheek isn’t my trip.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: When you forgive, you love. And when you love, God’s light shines upon you.
author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild

quote: My nature has always been to fight. My faith forces me to forgive.
author: Cindy Martinusen Coloma,  Caleb + Kate

quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relations.
author: Oscar Wilde,  A Woman of No Importance

quote: Forgiveness is healing—everything is energy—thoughts create—we are all connected—what you resist persists—true love never dies—the soul’s immortality is the only true immortality—
author: Alyson Noel,  Everlasting

quote: Is it easy? Usually not. But you don't forgive people for their benefit. You do it for your benefit.
author: Andrew Matthews

quote: Each of us suffers with envy/for the forgiven.
author: Marie Howe,  The Good Thief

quote: Selfishness must always be forgiven you know, because there is no hope of a cure.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Forgiving does not erase the bitter past. A healed memory is not a deleted memory. Instead, forgiving what we cannot forget creates a new way to remember. We change the memory of our past into a hope for our future.
author: Lewis B. Smedes

quote: Sonetimes the hardest person to forgive is yourself.
author: Sarah Sundin

quote: I'm a forgiver. I might not forget, but I forgive. My mother, father and older brother always told me: 'Don't hold grudges. If you do that, you don't lower yourself down to your adversary. Just treat people the way you want to be treated.' I honestly think that's why I was able to survive and have some success.
author: Monte Irvin

quote: The Gospel offers forgiveness for the past, new life for the present, and hope for the future.
author: John Sentamu
